description: The osapi_compute_link_prefix is supposed to override the url generated in links in the api. The versions resource does not use the config option, so odd output like http://host:port/ is returned.
title: versions links do not support osapi_compute_link_prefix

comments.content: The osapi_compute_link_prefix is supposed to override the url generated in links in the api. The versions resource does not use the config option, so odd output like http://host:port/ is returned.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/11973
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/11973
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/9e96a9256b59888060f0e634b3195af839569af9
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 9e96a9256b59888060f0e634b3195af839569af9
Author: Vishvananda Ishaya <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Aug 24 18:58:22 2012 -0700

    Adds api sample testing for versions
    
    This patch tests api samples for the versions resource in json and
    xml. It makes a small modification to the integrated api client to
    support making requests above /v2/tenant_id.
    
    This also fixes an uncovered bug in the link handling in the versions
    resource.
    
    Fixes bug 1041426
    
    Change-Id: Ie898ef3822fa250def2e0fa407a0968275262260
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
